Html:
Hi, all!

I'm testing Gmap.net control in Korea. It is shows a desolate map for my country. Please check the point (lat=37.6961, long=125.2985) with Gmap.NET. If I set gmap.type = GoogleMap, it shows only City name and a river. But if I go to Google directly, http://www.google.co.kr/maps?ie=UTF8&ll=37.520746,127.034633&spn=0.00571,0.00825&z=17, there are roads and buildings. (Can you see it?)

Would you please investigate on this?

Thanks,
laphir
hm.. looks like google use different servers for korea, http://mt3.gmaptiles.co.kr/mt/v=kr1.11&hl=lt&x=219&y=100&z=8&s=Galil
